text: Would love to see the repeatables navigation to be sticky in the page editor. Often, the module fields are relatively long within a repeatable and one needs to scroll down. In order to navigate to the next or previous element one needs to scroll up again. A sticky navigation would make the process quicker and help with UX.

On the topic of improving the usability of repeaters — users seem to have a hard time figuring out how to back out to the previous level of depth when editing a repeating module, especially when the breadcrumbs get trimmed due to longer labels. Some sort of “Back” or “Up One Level” navigation element would be a huge boon to the experience of using modules with repeaters!
